जरिए","Coursera":"Coursera","Help":"मदद","Best Course of All Time":"सभी समय का सबसे अच्छा कोर्स","reviews":"समीक्षा","38.4k":"38.4k","Add to list":"सूची में शामिल","Mark complete":"चिह्नित करना","Write review":"समीक्षा लिखो","Affiliate notice":"संबद्ध सूचना","About":"के बारे में","Related":"संबंधित","Reviews":"समीक्षा","Details":"विवरण","Play Course Trailer":"प्ले कोर्स ट्रेलर","Provider":"प्रदाता","Pricing":"मूल्य निर्धारण","Free Online Course (Audit)":"नि: शुल्क ऑनलाइन पाठ्यक्रम (लेखा परीक्षा)","Languages":"बोली","English":"अंग्रेज़ी","Certificate":"प्रमाणपत्र","Paid Certificate Available":"उपलब्ध प्रमाण पत्र","Duration & workload":"अवधि","13 weeks long, 71 hours worth of material":"13 सप्ताह लंबा, 71 घंटे की सामग्री","Sessions":"सत्र","6th Mar, 2023":"6 मार्च, 2023","19th Oct, 2020":"19 अक्टूबर, 2020","21st Sep, 2020":"21 सितंबर, 2020","24th Aug, 2020":"24 अगस्त, अंग्रेजी, स्पेनिश","Share this course":"इस पाठ्यक्रम को साझा करें","A Best Course of All Time":"सभी समय का सबसे अच्छा कोर्स","Found in":"में पाया","Neuroscience Courses":"तंत्रिका विज्ञान पाठ्यक्रम","Biology Courses":"जीव विज्ञान पाठ्यक्रम","Overview":"अवलोकन","Class Central Tips":"वर्ग केंद्रीय युक्तियाँ","Learn How to Sign up to Coursera courses for free":"नि: शुल्क के लिए Coursera पाठ्यक्रमों के लिए साइन अप करने के लिए जानें","1700 Coursera Courses That Are Still Completely Free":"1700 Coursera पाठ्यक्रम जो अभी भी पूरी तरह से स्वतंत्र हैं","Medical Neuroscience explores the functional organization and neurophysiology of the human central nervous system, while providing a neurobiological framework for understanding human behavior. In this course, you will discover the organization of the neural systems in the brain and spinal cord that mediate sensation, motivate bodily action, and integrate sensorimotor signals with memory, emotion and related faculties of cognition. The overall goal of this course is to provide the foundation for understanding the impairments of sensation, action and cognition that accompany injury, disease or dysfunction in the central nervous system. The course will build upon knowledge acquired through prior studies of cell and molecular biology, general physiology and human anatomy, as we focus primarily on the central nervous system.":"मेडिकल न्यूरोसाइंस मानव व्यवहार को समझने के लिए एक न्यूरोबायोलॉजिकल ढांचा प्रदान करते हुए, मानव केंद्रीय तंत्रिका तंत्र के कार्यात्मक संगठन और न्यूरोफिज़ियोलॉजी की पड़ताल करता है।","This online course is designed to include all of the core concepts in neurophysiology and clinical neuroanatomy that would be presented in most first-year neuroscience courses in schools of medicine. However, there are some topics (e.g., biological psychiatry) and several learning experiences (e.g., hands-on brain dissection) that we provide in the corresponding course offered in the Duke University School of Medicine on campus that we are not attempting to reproduce in Medical Neuroscience online. Nevertheless, our aim is to faithfully present in scope and rigor a medical school caliber course experience.":"यह ऑनलाइन पाठ्यक्रम न्यूरोफिज़ियोलॉजी और नैदानिक न्यूरोनाटॉमी में सभी मुख्य अवधारणाओं को शामिल करने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है जो चिकित्सा के स्कूलों में अधिकांश प्रथम वर्ष के तंत्रिका विज्ञान पाठ्यक्रमों में प्रस्तुत किया जाएगा।","This course comprises six units of content organized into 12 weeks, with an additional week for a comprehensive final exam:":"इस पाठ्यक्रम में 12 सप्ताह में आयोजित छह इकाइयाँ शामिल हैं, एक व्यापक अंतिम परीक्षा के लिए एक अतिरिक्त सप्ताह के साथ:","- Unit 1 Neuroanatomy (weeks 1-2). This unit covers the surface anatomy of the human brain, its internal structure, and the overall organization of sensory and motor systems in the brainstem and spinal cord.":"- यूनिट 1 न्यूरोनाटॉमी (सप्ताह 1-2)।","- Unit 2 Neural signaling (weeks 3-4). This unit addresses the fundamental mechanisms of neuronal excitability, signal generation and propagation, synaptic transmission, post synaptic mechanisms of signal integration, and neural plasticity.":"- यूनिट 2 न्यूरल सिग्नलिंग (सप्ताह 3-4)।","- Unit 3 Sensory systems (weeks 5-7). Here, you will learn the overall organization and function of the sensory systems that contribute to our sense of self relative to the world around us: somatic sensory systems, proprioception, vision, audition, and balance senses.":"- यूनिट 3 सेंसरी सिस्टम (सप्ताह 5-7)।","- Unit 4 Motor systems (weeks 8-9). In this unit, we will examine the organization and function of the brain and spinal mechanisms that govern bodily movement.":"- यूनिट 4 मोटर सिस्टम (सप्ताह 8-9)।","- Unit 5 Brain Development (week 10). Next, we turn our attention to the neurobiological mechanisms for building the nervous system in embryonic development and in early postnatal life; we will also consider how the brain changes across the lifespan.":"- यूनिट 5 मस्तिष्क विकास (सप्ताह 10)।","- Unit 6 Cognition (weeks 11-12). The course concludes with a survey of the association systems of the cerebral hemispheres, with an emphasis on cortical networks that integrate perception, memory and emotion in organizing behavior and planning for the future; we will also consider brain systems for maintaining homeostasis and regulating brain state.":"- यूनिट 6 अनुभूति (सप्ताह 11-12)।","Read more":"और पढ़ें","Syllabus":"पाठ्यक्रम","Getting Started in Medical Neuroscience":"मेडिकल न्यूरोसाइंस में शुरुआत करना","Let's get started in Medical Neuroscience! Each module in Medical Neuroscience will begin with a brief description like this that provides you with an overview of the module. In this first module, you will get to know something about Prof. White and his career in neuroscience; you will understand the scope of Medical Neuroscience, its learning resources, your responsibilities for maximizing your benefit in this course, and you will learn Prof. White's tips on how best to study and learn.":"चलो चिकित्सा तंत्रिका विज्ञान में शुरू करते हैं!","At the end of this module, please take the ungraded preliminary quiz, \"Are you ready for Medical Neuroscience\", to self-assess your background knowledge. Your score on this quiz will not count toward your overall score in this course. However, you should be able to pass this quiz (score 70% or better) if you are ready for the academic challenge of this course. Students who are likely to achieve their goals in Medical Neuroscience should be able to successfully answer nearly all of the quiz questions on their first attempt and feel comfortable with assessment questions at this level of knowledge.":"%20the%20end%20of%20th%20module,%20please%20take%20the%20ungraded%20preliminary%20quiz,%20%22ARE%20YOU%20READY%20FERERAL%20MEDICAL%20Neuroscience%22,%20to- 20th- 20sess%20your%20","Neuroanatomy: Introducing the Human Brain":"न्यूरोनाटॉमी: मानव मस्तिष्क का परिचय","Your introduction to Medical Neuroscience continues as you experience in this module a brief introduction to the human brain, its component cells, and some basic anatomical conventions for finding your way around the human central nervous system.":"चिकित्सा तंत्रिका विज्ञान के लिए आपका परिचय जारी है क्योंकि आप इस मॉड्यूल में मानव मस्तिष्क, उसके घटक कोशिकाओं और मानव केंद्रीय तंत्रिका तंत्र के आसपास अपना रास्ता खोजने के लिए कुछ बुनियादी शारीरिक सम्मेलनों के लिए एक संक्षिप्त परिचय का अनुभव करते हैं।","Neuroanatomy: Surface Anatomy of the Human CNS":"न्यूरोनेटोमी: मानव सीएनएस की सतह शरीर रचना","We now begin in earnest our lessons on neuroanatomy with the surface of the human brain, including a brief run through the cranial nerves and the blood supply to the CNS. In this module, you will learn the basic subdivisions of the vertebrate nervous system; however, your focus should be on the cerebral cortex. Along the way, you will be challenged to \"build a digital brain\" that should help you generate and improve your mental “model” of the cerebral hemispheres of the human brain. Another great way to refine your mental model is through sketching and crafting, so please do the learning objectives that are designed to help you make visible (and tangible) your understanding of the cerebral hemispheres.":"अब हम मानव मस्तिष्क की सतह के साथ न्यूरोनाटॉमी पर अपने पाठों को शुरू करते हैं, जिसमें कपाल नसों के माध्यम से एक संक्षिप्त रन और सीएनएस को रक्त की आपूर्ति शामिल है।","Neuroanatomy: Internal Anatomy of the Human CNS":"न्यूरोनाटॉमी: मानव सीएनएस की आंतरिक शारीरिक रचना","Neural Signaling: Electrical Excitability and Signal Propagation":"न्यूरल सिग्नलिंग: विद्युत उत्तेजना और संकेत प्रसार","We now turn our attention from the tangible (human neuroanatomy) to the physiological as we explore the means by which neurons generate, propagate and communicate electrical signals. After exploring those structures in the human brain that are visible to the unaided eye, we must now sharpen our focus and zoom-in, as it were, to the unitary level of organization and function in the central nervous system: to the level of individual neurons and their component parts that are crucial for neural signaling.":"अब हम अपना ध्यान मूर्त (मानव न्यूरोनेटोमी) से शारीरिक रूप से बदल देते हैं क्योंकि हम उन साधनों का पता लगाते हैं जिनके द्वारा न्यूरॉन्स विद्युत संकेतों को उत्पन्न करते हैं, प्रचारित करते हैं और संचार करते हैं।","Neural Signaling: Synaptic Transmission and Synaptic Plasticity":"न्यूरल सिग्नलिंग: सिनैप्टिक ट्रांसमिशन और सिनैप्टिक प्लास्टिसिटी","Let’s continue our studies of neural signaling by learning about what happens at synaptic junctions, where the terminal ending of one neuron meets a complementary process of another excitable cell.":"आइए, सिनैप्टिक जंक्शनों पर क्या होता है, इसके बारे में जानकर तंत्रिका सिग्नलिंग के हमारे अध्ययन को जारी रखें, जहां एक न्यूरॉन का टर्मिनल समाप्ति एक अन्य उत्तेजक सेल की एक पूरक प्रक्रिया को पूरा करता है।","Sensory Systems: General Principles and Somatic Sensation":"संवेदी प्रणाली: सामान्य सिद्धांत और दैहिक सनसनी","We have reached a significant juncture in Medical Neuroscience as we turn our attention to the organization and function of the sensory systems. We will begin our studies with the somatic sensory systems, which includes subsystems for mechanical sensation and pain/temperature sensation. But before we get there, it is worth considering first some organizing principles that will set the stage for studies of somatic sensation and all the other sensory systems of the body.":"हम चिकित्सा तंत्रिका विज्ञान में एक महत्वपूर्ण मोड़ पर पहुंच गए हैं क्योंकि हम अपना ध्यान संगठन और संवेदी प्रणालियों के कार्य की ओर देखते हैं।","Sensory Systems: The Visual System":"संवेदी प्रणाली: दृश्य प्रणाली","This module will provide lessons that are designed to help you understand the basic mechanisms by which light is transduced into electrical signals that are then used to construct visual perceptions in the brain. Your studies of the visual system will benefit you at this point in the course, but also in later studies when we use the visual system as a model for understanding general principles of developmental plasticity. Lastly, it is worth noting how much of the forebrain contains elements of the visual pathways. Thus, injuries and disease in widespread regions of the brain may have a clinically important impact on visual function. All the more reason to learn these lessons well as you progress in Medical Neuroscience.":"यह मॉड्यूल उन पाठों को प्रदान करेगा जो आपको उन बुनियादी तंत्रों को समझने में मदद करने के लिए डिज़ाइन किए गए हैं जिनके द्वारा प्रकाश को विद्युत संकेतों में स्थानांतरित किया जाता है जो तब मस्तिष्क में दृश्य धारणाओं के निर्माण के लिए उपयोग किए जाते हैं।","Sensory Systems: Audition, Vestibular Sensation and the Chemical Senses":"संवेदी प्रणाली: ऑडिशन, वेस्टिबुलर सनसनी और रासायनिक इंद्रियां","Our survey of the sensory systems continues as we now turn our attention to the auditory system, the vestibular system, and the chemical sensory systems. As you study this content, notice the similarities and the differences that pertain to the general mechanisms of sensory transduction and the broad organization of the central pathways in each of these sensory systems. In particular, note the similarity in transduction mechanisms for audition and vestibular sensation; and note the “logic” of sensory coding in the chemical sensory systems.":"संवेदी प्रणालियों का हमारा सर्वेक्षण जारी है क्योंकि अब हम श्रवण प्रणाली, वेस्टिबुलर सिस्टम और रासायनिक संवेदी प्रणालियों की ओर अपना ध्यान केंद्रित करते हैं।","Movement and Motor Control: Lower and Upper Motor Neurons":"आंदोलन और मोटर नियंत्रण: निचला और ऊपरी मोटर न्यूरॉन्स","We come now to another pivot in Medical Neuroscience where our focus shifts from sensation to action. Or to borrow a phrase made famous by C.S. Sherrington more than a century ago (the title of his classic text), we will now consider the “integrative action of the nervous system”. We will do so in this module by learning the basic mechanisms by which neural circuits in the brain and spinal cord motivate bodily movement.":"हम अब मेडिकल न्यूरोसाइंस में एक और पिवट पर आते हैं, जहां हमारा फोकस सनसनी से कार्रवाई में बदल जाता है।","Movement and Motor Control: Understanding the Paradigm of Eye Movements":"आंदोलन और मोटर नियंत्रण: आंखों के आंदोलनों के प्रतिमान को समझना","At this juncture in our exploration of motor control, let’s focus on one of the best studied paradigms for understanding the neural control of movement: the eye movement system.":"मोटर नियंत्रण की हमारी खोज में इस मोड़ पर, आइए आंदोलन के तंत्रिका नियंत्रण को समझने के लिए सबसे अच्छे अध्ययन किए गए प्रतिमानों में से एक पर ध्यान दें: नेत्र आंदोलन प्रणाली।","Movement and Motor Control: Modulation of Movement":"आंदोलन और मोटर नियंत्रण: आंदोलन का मॉड्यूलेशन","Next, we will consider two major brain systems that modulate the output of upper motor neuronal circuits: the basal ganglia and the cerebellum. Take note: the output of these systems is NOT directed at lower motor circuits directly; rather, their output engages the motor thalamus and brainstem upper motor neuronal circuits. Thus, the actions of the basal ganglia and cerebellum are to modulate, rather than command, the activities of upper motor neurons. As you study the lessons in this module, appreciate how the basal ganglia and cerebellum function in a somewhat complementary fashion to modulate the initiation and coordination of movement, respectively.":"अगला, हम दो प्रमुख मस्तिष्क प्रणालियों पर विचार करेंगे जो ऊपरी मोटर न्यूरोनल सर्किट के उत्पादन को संशोधित करते हैं: बेसल गैन्ग्लिया और सेरिबैलम।","Movement and Motor Control: Visceral Motor Control":"आंदोलन और मोटर नियंत्रण: आंत की मोटर नियंत्रण","We conclude our survey of movement and motor control by considering the visceral motor system, perhaps better known as the autonomic nervous system. As you study this lesson, consider how the disparate physiology of the viscera has impact not only on the internal state of the body, but also on implicit processing in the forebrain. We will return to this matter when we consider the neurobiology of emotions near the conclusion of Medical Neuroscience":"हम आंत की मोटर प्रणाली पर विचार करके आंदोलन और मोटर नियंत्रण के हमारे सर्वेक्षण को समाप्त करते हैं, शायद स्वायत्त तंत्रिका तंत्र के रूप में बेहतर जाना जाता है।","The Changing Brain: The Brain Across the Lifespan":"बदलते मस्तिष्क: जीवन भर के पार मस्तिष्क","This module represents another turning point in Medical Neuroscience. Now that we have surveyed human neuroanatomy and our sensory and motor systems, we are ready to take a step back and consider how this magnificent central nervous system came to be the way that it is. We will also learn how the brain re-wires itself across the lifespan as genetic specification, experience-dependent plasticity and self-organization continue to interact, re-shaping the structure and function of neural circuits throughout the central nervous system.":"यह मॉड्यूल चिकित्सा तंत्रिका विज्ञान में एक और मोड़ बिंदु का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।","Complex Brain Functions: Associational Cortex":"जटिल मस्तिष्क कार्य: एसोसिएशनल कॉर्टेक्स","It may surprise you to know that in all of our studies of the neural systems for sensation and action, we have yet to properly account for the organization and function of roughly 75% of the entire cerebral mantle. Thus, only 25% of the cerebral cortex is accounted for by the modal sensory and motor cortical areas. The majority of the human cerebral cortex is multi-modal cortex that associates signals derived from one or more modal systems. We now turn our attention to this “associational cortex” as we consider more complex aspects of brain function.":"यह%20may%20surprise%20you%20to%20knoka%20th%20in%20AL%20AL%20OUR%20OUR%20STUDIES%20OF%20THER 20NERESTER%20SYSTESTS%20SESTEMS%20FERSATIONATIONATE%20AND%20AND,%20WE%20HAVE%20TET 20TA%20TO%20TO%20TO%20TO%20TO%20TO%20TO%20TA%20TA%","Complex Brain Functions: Sleep, Emotion and Addiction":"जटिल मस्तिष्क कार्य: नींद, भावना और लत","In this concluding module of Medical Neuroscience, we will consider the neurobiology of sleep and the neurobiology of emotion, including addiction. Both topics involve explorations of complex, widely distributed systems in the forebrain and brainstem that modulate states of body and brain.":"चिकित्सा तंत्रिका विज्ञान के इस समापन मॉड्यूल में, हम नींद के न्यूरोबायोलॉजी और न्यूरोबायोलॉजी ऑफ इमोशनलियोलॉजी पर विचार करेंगे, जिसमें लत भी शामिल है।","Comprehensive Final Exam":"व्यापक अंतिम परीक्षा","This module contains materials that will help you prepare for the final challenge in Medical Neuroscience: our clinical case-based, Comprehensive Final Exam.":"इस मॉड्यूल में ऐसी सामग्री है जो आपको मेडिकल न्यूरोसाइंस में अंतिम चुनौती के लिए तैयार करने में मदद करेगी: हमारे नैदानिक मामले-आधारित, व्यापक अंतिम परीक्षा।","Closing Remarks":"अंतिम शब्द","Please allow me a few more moments of your time to express my thanks for all your efforts to make it through Medical Neuroscience, and to wish you well on all your future endeavors!":"कृपया मुझे अपने समय के कुछ और क्षणों को चिकित्सा तंत्रिका विज्ञान के माध्यम से बनाने के लिए अपने सभी प्रयासों के लिए धन्यवाद व्यक्त करने के लिए, और अपने भविष्य के सभी प्रयासों पर आपको शुभकामनाएं देने की अनुमति दें!","Taught by":"द्वारा सिखाया","Leonard E. A glimpse of his brilliance as an instructor is when a learner walks away successfully with the knowledge of a medical student and can apply that to research or a clinical situation. The examples that Professor White lectures stuck in my head; the pictures he selects or the ones he draws are easy to recall. Neuroscience is a visual subject as much as it is knowledge-based, and this course stresses and utilizes both. Professor’s White unique talents are 1) to seamlessly repeat an important concept always in a fresh way and 2) to predict the learners’ struggles and confusions and address them. It is no wonder that students at his school honored Len with prestigious teaching awards. You can easily see Dr. White’s excitement for neuroscience and his passion for teaching. I appreciate the variety of learning materials posted on the learnmedicalneuroscience.nl website, including notes and student videos, and spent my first week of the course locating many of the learning materials. I am certain there are some I have not found yet. I was thrilled to be able to locate a used 5th ed. textbook in 2022 and would highly recommend having a text for the illustrations, which Prof. White uses in the video lectures,  and so you can write in it. It led to huge funding rounds. Some companies went public, while others got acquired.":"।","But it also seems that many (if not all) overestimated the “new normal.” In 2022, big online learning providers underwent layoffs. And as we enter 2023, we are left with only one major independent MOOC provider.":"लेकिन यह भी लगता है कि कई (यदि सभी नहीं) ने \"नए सामान्य\" को कम कर दिया।","Online learning is stronger than ever (Class Central ended 2022 with":"ऑनलाइन लर्निंग पहले से कहीं ज्यादा मजबूत है (क्लास सेंट्रल 2022 के साथ समाप्त हुआ","100% year-over-year growth":"100 %% 20YEAR-REAL-YEAR%20GROWTH","), but VC-funded online learning companies are struggling to match their lofty valuations.":"), लेकिन वीसी-वित्त पोषित ऑनलाइन सीखने वाली कंपनियां अपने बुलंद मूल्यांकन से मेल खाने के लिए संघर्ष कर रही हैं।","The “New Normal” that Wasn’t":"\"नया सामान्य\" जो नहीं था","The real reason online learning received a boost in 2020 was because due to quarantine measures, millions of people around the world had time and energy. The energy quickly dissipated as the quarantine measures dragged on, and as things started opening up again, time dissipated too.":"2020 में वास्तविक कारण ऑनलाइन लर्निंग को बढ़ावा मिला क्योंकि संगरोध उपायों के कारण, दुनिया भर के लाखों लोगों के पास समय और ऊर्जा थी।","Graph of Class Central users in 2020, showing the “pandemic boost”":"2020 में वर्ग केंद्रीय उपयोगकर्ताओं का ग्राफ, \"महामारी बूस्ट\" दिखाते हुए","We experienced this first-hand. Of all the people who used Class Central from its inception in 2011 to the end of 2020,":"हमने इस पहले हाथ का अनुभव किया।","40% (18+ million) did so for the first time in 2020 alone":"40 %% 20 (18+%20 मिलियन)%20did%20 तो%20for%20the%20first%20time%20in%202020%20 अकेले","But as you can see above, the peak lasted only a few months. Things quickly went back to “normal.” But the “new normal” was higher than before the pandemic.":"लेकिन जैसा कि आप ऊपर देख सकते हैं, शिखर केवल कुछ महीनों तक चला।","And how high this was depended on the platform’s catalog and their":"और यह कितना उच्च मंच के कैटलॉग और उनके पर निर्भर था","pandemic response":"महामारी की प्रतिक्रिया",". Like the":"।",", the pandemic created FOMO and opportunities that some companies were able to capitalize on. Here’s what I wrote in my 2020 year in review titled":", महामारी ने FOMO और अवसर पैदा किए जो कुछ कंपनियों को कैपिटल करने में सक्षम थे।","The Second Year of the MOOC":"MOOC का दूसरा वर्ष","“[The pandemic boost] allowed them (online course platforms) to skip forward: they’re now where they would have expected to be two years down the road, in the absence of a pandemic.”":"\"[महामारी बूस्ट] ने उन्हें (ऑनलाइन कोर्स प्लेटफॉर्म) को आगे बढ़ाने की अनुमति दी: वे अब जहां वे एक महामारी की अनुपस्थिति में सड़क से दो साल नीचे होने की उम्मीद करते थे।\"","The real impact of the pandemic was free marketing and the influx of new learners. The constraints of time and energy are barriers that online learning platforms still haven’t figured out.":"महामारी का वास्तविक प्रभाव मुक्त विपणन और नए शिक्षार्थियों की आमद थी।","Intoxicated (or deluded) by this idea of a “new normal,” many online learning companies raised a lot of venture capital and rapidly expanded headcount, expecting growth to continue.":"\"नए सामान्य\" के इस विचार से नशे में (या बहक), कई ऑनलाइन सीखने वाली कंपनियों ने बहुत सारी उद्यम पूंजी और तेजी से विस्तारित हेडकाउंट को उठाया, जिससे विकास जारी रहेगा।","But this proved shortsighted, because while the pandemic shone a spotlight on online education, it also prompted a global economic downturn, accompanied by shrinking venture capital. As a result, online platforms turned their focus to sustainability and cost-cutting, leading to a slew of layoffs.":"लेकिन यह शॉर्टसाइट साबित हुआ, क्योंकि महामारी ऑनलाइन शिक्षा पर एक सुर्खियों में आ गई, इसने एक वैश्विक आर्थिक मंदी को भी प्रेरित किया, जिसमें वेंचर कैपिटल सिकुड़ रहा था।","Note":"टिप्पणी","Usually for the end of the year analysis, we do a":"आमतौर पर वर्ष विश्लेषण के अंत के लिए, हम एक करते हैं","multiple-article series focused on “MOOCs”":"बहु-लेख श्रृंखला \"एमओओसी\" पर केंद्रित है",", including our popular “MOOCs by The Numbers” (here’s the":", हमारे लोकप्रिय \"MOOCs by Numbers\" सहित (यहाँ है","2021 edition":"2021 संस्करण","). But this year, we’re trying something new. There are two reasons for it.":")।","Class Central has grown.":"क्लास सेंट्रल बढ़ा है।","In the last two years, we’ve expanded our catalog beyond what we call “MOOCs” and":"पिछले दो वर्षों में, हमने अपनी कैटलॉग का विस्तार किया है जिसे हम \"MOOCS\" कहते हैं और","now list 100,000+ courses":"अब 100,000 पाठ्यक्रम सूचीबद्ध करें",". We’d like to do the same for our reporting: cover the entire online learning ecosystem (specifically, the adult learning subset).":"।","MOOCs aren’t just MOOCs":"MOOCs केवल MOOCs नहीं हैं",". Coursera remains the only independent player, while its two nearest competitors have been absorbed into “non-MOOC” ecosystems. Even before this, for years, I felt like I was sticking to an arbitrary definition of “MOOC,” forcefully splitting courses and platforms into MOOCs and non-MOOCs.":"।","This is our first time going beyond what we call MOOCs, so we definitely won’t be as thorough as we were in past years. Let us know your thoughts through comments, tweets, or email.":"यह हमारा पहला मौका है जो हम MOOCs कहते हैं, इसलिए हम निश्चित रूप से पिछले वर्षों में पूरी तरह से नहीं होंगे।","2022 Layoffs":"2022 छंटनी","Here’s a compilation of all the layoffs that we know have occurred in 2022 in online learning. Udemy and Coursera’s B2C revenues in 2022 Q3 might give us a hint.":"?","On the surface, Udemy and Coursera are similar: they’re both marketplaces for online courses. Where they mainly differ is on":"सतह पर, उडमी और कोर्टसेरा समान हैं: वे दोनों ऑनलाइन पाठ्यक्रमों के लिए मार्केटप्लेस हैं।","who":"WHO","can offer these courses. But what they sell is quite different. On Udemy, you pay for the course, while on Coursera, the course is usually free-to-audit, and what you really pay for is the credential or certificate.":"इन पाठ्यक्रमों की पेशकश कर सकते हैं।","2U Powered Degrees Pricing Chart":"2U संचालित डिग्री मूल्य निर्धारण चार्ट","How much do":"कितना करते हैं","degrees powered by 2U actually cost":"2U द्वारा संचालित डिग्री वास्तव में लागत","? Cumulatively, it has seen $390M in revenue, out of which $316M were donations. Day-to-day financial transactions such as revenue, taxes, interest, loans and others can be recorded and stored, and the accuracy and efficiency of documentation determines the overall financial health of the organization.":"प्रक्रिया।","Bookkeeper is the person designated by an organization to perform bookkeeping functions. Research shows that methods of keeping accounts have existed as far back in history as":"बुककीपर एक संगठन द्वारा नामित व्यक्ति है जो बहीखाता कार्य करता है।","2600 BCE":"2600 ईसा पूर्व","when Babylonians used to write records on clay slabs. However, most businesses today use computer-based methods for bookkeeping such as a simple spreadsheet or more advanced software.":"जब बेबीलोनियन क्ले स्लैब पर रिकॉर्ड लिखते थे।","Why are Bookkeeping Skills Important?":"बहीखाता कौशल क्यों महत्वपूर्ण हैं?","The job market for bookkeepers is expected to grow with the rise of small businesses and the increasing importance of financial management. Bookkeepers with strong technical skills, including cloud computing and automation, are in high demand and can offer additional value through data analysis.":"बुककीपर्स के लिए नौकरी बाजार छोटे व्यवसायों के उदय और वित्तीय प्रबंधन के बढ़ते महत्व के साथ बढ़ने की उम्मीद है।","Bookkeeper salaries vary greatly by country, location, and company size.":"बुककीपर वेतन देश, स्थान और कंपनी के आकार से बहुत भिन्न होता है।","In the US":"अमेरिका में",", the median hourly wage is $20.66, and":", औसत प्रति घंटा मजदूरी $ 20.66 है, और","in the UK":"ब्रिटेन में",", the average salary is £25,000. Bookkeeping Foundations and Advanced Techniques (LinkedIn Learning)":"1. बहीखाता नींव और उन्नत तकनीक (लिंक्डइन लर्निंग)","Jim Stice (left) and Kay Stice (right), instructors":"जिम स्टाइस (बाएं) और केई स्टाइस (दाएं), प्रशिक्षक","My first pick for the best bookkeeping online course is a collection of two courses offered by Jim Stice and Kay Stice on LinkedIn Learning.":"सबसे अच्छा बहीखाता ऑनलाइन पाठ्यक्रम के लिए मेरी पहली पिक लिंक्डइन लर्निंग पर जिम स्टाइस और केई स्टाइस द्वारा पेश किए गए दो पाठ्यक्रमों का एक संग्रह है।","The two courses you’ll be taking are:":"आप जो दो पाठ्यक्रम ले रहे हैं, वे हैं:","Accounting Foundations: Bookkeeping":"लेखांकन नींव: बहीखातापिंग","Advanced Bookkeeping Techniques":"उन्नत बहीखाता तकनीक","The first course teaches the basics of bookkeeping and financial statement creation while the second course focuses on advanced accounting strategies for managing financial entries. After completing both the courses, you’ll have developed the essential skills and knowledge needed to effectively manage the financial records of a business or organization.":"पहला पाठ्यक्रम बहीखाता और वित्तीय विवरण निर्माण की मूल बातें सिखाता है जबकि दूसरा पाठ्यक्रम वित्तीय प्रविष्टियों के प्रबंधन के लिए उन्नत लेखांकन रणनीतियों पर केंद्रित है।","What You’ll Learn":"आप क्या सीखेंगे","In the course, you’ll learn about financial statements, which includes the balance sheet, income statement, and statement of cash flows. You’ll also learn about the four steps in the bookkeeping process: routine bookkeeping, analyzing transactions, using accounts to categorize transactions, and exercising caution with revenues, expenses, and dividends.":"पाठ्यक्रम में, आप वित्तीय विवरणों के बारे में जानेंगे, जिसमें बैलेंस शीट, आय विवरण और नकदी प्रवाह का विवरण शामिल है।","This course covers debits and credits, journal entries, adjusting entries, closing entries, and correcting errors. You’ll explore journal entries for receiving financing, buying assets, and recording revenues and expenses. Finally, you’ll learn about closing entries and correcting errors.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम में डेबिट और क्रेडिट, जर्नल प्रविष्टियाँ, प्रविष्टियों को समायोजित करना, प्रविष्टियों को बंद करना और त्रुटियों को सही करना शामिल है।","How You’ll Learn":"आप कैसे सीखेंगे","The first course is broken down into 6 modules and the second course is broken down into 7 modules. Each course involves about 1 to 2 hours of work. With a built-in type inference system that eliminates the need for explicit type annotations, if your code compiles, your code is guaranteed to be type error-free at compile time.":"क्रिस्टल के साथ, आप कम कोड लिख सकते हैं और अधिक काम कर सकते हैं।","But don’t let its ease of use and high levels of abstraction fool you into thinking that it’ll be sluggish — nay, Crystal is extremely fast! It is built on top of the LLVM compiler infrastructure, giving it performance on par with C and C++. This means that your Crystal code can run faster and use less memory than code written in other languages.":"लेकिन इसके उपयोग में आसानी और उच्च स्तर के अमूर्तता को यह सोचकर मूर्ख नहीं बनाते हैं कि यह सुस्त होगा - नाय, क्रिस्टल बहुत तेज़ है!","Not only is Crystal a great choice for building web applications and servers, thanks to its growing ecosystem of community libraries and frameworks such as":"न केवल क्रिस्टल वेब एप्लिकेशन और सर्वर के निर्माण के लिए एक बढ़िया विकल्प है, सामुदायिक पुस्तकालयों और ढांचे के बढ़ते पारिस्थितिकी तंत्र के लिए धन्यवाद","Amber":"अंबर","that replaces":"वह प्रतिस्थापित करता है","Ruby on Rails":"रूबी ऑन रेल्स","Kemal":"कमाल","that replaces Sinatra, you can go even beyond.":"यह सिनात्रा की जगह लेता है, आप भी आगे जा सकते हैं।","Are you ready to dive into the world of Crystal programming? Read on to see my top picks for the best course to learn Crystal.":"क्या आप क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग की दुनिया में गोता लगाने के लिए तैयार हैं?","Here are my top picks. Click on one to skip to the course details:":"यहाँ मेरे शीर्ष पिक्स हैं।","Crystal For Rubyists (Serdar Dogruyol)":"क्रिस्टल फॉर रूयिस्ट्स (सेडर डोगुयोल)","N/A":"एन/ए","Best":"श्रेष्ठ","Crystal course for Ruby developers":"रूबी डेवलपर्स के लिए क्रिस्टल कोर्स","Tutorials – Crystal (crystal-lang.org)":"ट्यूटोरियल-क्रिस्टल (क्रिस्टल-lang.org)","Best short yet effective":"बेस्ट शॉर्ट अभी तक प्रभावी","introduction to Crystal for complete beginners to programming":"प्रोग्रामिंग के लिए पूर्ण शुरुआती के लिए क्रिस्टल का परिचय","Crystal Course (Groxio)":"क्रिस्टल कोर्स (ग्रोक्सियो)","Best hands-on Crystal course with a book, videos, small exercises, and larger projects":"एक पुस्तक, वीडियो, छोटे अभ्यास और बड़ी परियोजनाओं के साथ सर्वश्रेष्ठ हैंड्स-ऑन क्रिस्टल कोर्स","Learn Programming in Crystal Lang course (Gábor Szabó)":"क्रिस्टल लैंग कोर्स (Gábor Szabó) में प्रोग्रामिंग सीखें","3–4 hours":"3-4 घंटे","introductory Crystal course for programmers":"प्रोग्रामर के लिए परिचयात्मक क्रिस्टल कोर्स","Learn Crystal Programming (Timnan Sheni)":"क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग सीखें (टिमन शेनि)","3 hours":"3 घंटे","Best project-based video course for complete beginners to programming":"प्रोग्रामिंग के लिए पूर्ण शुरुआती के लिए सर्वश्रेष्ठ परियोजना-आधारित वीडियो पाठ्यक्रम","Crystal (Exercism)":"क्रिस्टल (व्यायाम)","Best platform to practice Crystal with":"के साथ क्रिस्टल का अभ्यास करने के लिए सबसे अच्छा मंच","mentoring":"सलाह","Crystal Koans (Andrea Manzini)":"क्रिस्टल कोन्स (एंड्रिया मंज़िनी)","hands-on exercises to learn Crystal incrementally":"क्रिस्टल को बढ़ाने के लिए हैंड्स-ऑन एक्सरसाइज","What is Crystal?":"क्रिस्टल क्या है?","Crystal is a general-purpose, object-oriented programming language designed for high performance and readability. Developed in 2014 by Ary Borenszweig, Juan Wajnerman, Brian Cardiff, and a team of over 300 contributors, Crystal has a seductive tagline: “":"क्रिस्टल एक सामान्य-उद्देश्य, ऑब्जेक्ट-ओरिएंटेड प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा है जिसे उच्च प्रदर्शन और पठनीयता के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है।","Fast as C, slick as Ruby":"Fast as C, slick as Ruby","Fast as C:":"सी के रूप में तेजी से:","Crystal is about 10% slower than C":"क्रिस्टल%20IS%20ABOUT%2010%%20Slower%20than%20C",". This is quite impressive considering that C is a low-level language with no garbage collection while Crystal is a high-level language with garbage collection. In comparison, Ruby is about 8 times slower than Crystal. Crystal’s blazingly fast performance can be attributed to its LLVM compiler infrastructure, the same compiler technology used by C and C++ itself, as well as other famously fast languages such as Fortran, Rust, and Julia. Crystal also prides itself on its C interoperability, making it easy to call native C libraries. And if you want to see how Crystal fares in real-world usage, just compare the":"।","framework (Crystal) to Sinatra (Ruby) and Ruby on Rails (Ruby) in the barchart below.":"नीचे दिए गए बारकार्ट में सिनात्रा (रूबी) और रूबी ऑन रेल (रूबी) पर फ्रेमवर्क (क्रिस्टल)।","Chart created by Dmitry Rocha, from":"दिमित्री रोचा द्वारा बनाया गया चार्ट, से","Crystal by Numbers Benchmarking Kemal, Ruby on Rails, and Sinatra | The Miners":"क्रिस्टल द्वारा संख्या बेंचमार्किंग केमल, रूबी ऑन रेल्स, और सिनात्रा |","Slick as Ruby:":"रूबी के रूप में चालाक:","Crystal’s syntax is heavily inspired by Ruby — if you’re a Ruby veteran, you’ll feel right at home. But if you have not touched Ruby in your life, you’ll still find yourself picking up the language quite fast due to its simple, human-readable syntax. Additionally, Crystal has a built-in package manager called Shards (similar to Ruby’s gems) which makes it easy to install and manage dependencies.":"क्रिस्टल का सिंटैक्स रूबी से बहुत प्रेरित है - यदि आप एक रूबी अनुभवी हैं, तो आप घर पर सही महसूस करेंगे।","But unlike Ruby, Crystal is statically type-checked, which means type errors will be caught early by the compiler rather than fail on runtime. Don’t worry though, you don’t need to explicitly define types as the compiler can intelligently infer types. Crystal also supports many modern features such as a macro system for powerful metaprogramming capabilities as well as support for concurrency, making it well-suited for high-performance and concurrent systems.":"लेकिन रूबी के विपरीत, क्रिस्टल को सांख्यिकीय रूप से टाइप-चेक किया जाता है, जिसका अर्थ है कि प्रकार की त्रुटियों को रनटाइम पर विफल होने के बजाय कंपाइलर द्वारा जल्दी पकड़ा जाएगा।","Crystal has a wide range of applications, including web development, systems programming, and data processing. It is often":"क्रिस्टल में वेब विकास, सिस्टम प्रोग्रामिंग और डेटा प्रोसेसिंग सहित अनुप्रयोगों की एक विस्तृत श्रृंखला है।","used by companies":"कंपनियों द्वारा उपयोग किया जाता है","such as":"जैसे कि","84codes":"84codes","Invidious":"अपमानजनक",", and":", और","Protel":"प्रचुर","for building web servers, web APIs, and web scraping tools, due to its performance and expressiveness. And since it is concurrent, Crystal is also suitable for building command-line tools, distributed systems, and data processing pipelines. Though Crystal is relatively niche even compared to other niche languages out there, Crystal programmers are one of the most highly paid developers according to the":"वेब सर्वर, वेब एपीआई और वेब स्क्रैपिंग टूल के निर्माण के लिए, इसके प्रदर्शन और अभिव्यक्ति के कारण।","2022 Stack Overflow Developer survey":"2022 स्टैक ओवरफ्लो डेवलपर सर्वेक्षण",", with a median yearly salary of $84,690.":", $ 84,690 के एक औसत वार्षिक वेतन के साथ।","Best Courses Guides Methodology":"सर्वश्रेष्ठ पाठ्यक्रम कार्यप्रणाली मार्गदर्शन","I built this ranking following the now tried-and-tested methodology used in previous Best Courses Guides (":"मैंने पिछले सर्वश्रेष्ठ पाठ्यक्रम गाइडों में इस्तेमाल की जाने वाली अब और परीक्षण की गई कार्यप्रणाली के बाद इस रैंकिंग का निर्माण किया (","Crystal courses":"क्रिस्टल पाठ्यक्रम","Well-made courses were picked if they presented valuable and engaging content and they have to fit in a set of criteria and be ranked accordingly: comprehensive curriculum, affordability, release date, ratings and enrollments.":"यदि वे मूल्यवान और आकर्षक सामग्री प्रस्तुत करते हैं, तो अच्छी तरह से बनाए गए पाठ्यक्रमों को चुना गया था और उन्हें मानदंडों के एक सेट में फिट होना पड़ता है और तदनुसार रैंक किया जाता है: व्यापक पाठ्यक्रम, सामर्थ्य, रिलीज की तारीख, रेटिंग और नामांकन।","Here are some aggregate stats about the ranking:":"यहां रैंकिंग के बारे में कुछ कुल आँकड़े दिए गए हैं:","All of the courses are suitable for beginners to Crystal, while two courses are friendly towards complete newbies to programming.":"सभी पाठ्यक्रम क्रिस्टल के लिए शुरुआती लोगों के लिए उपयुक्त हैं, जबकि दो पाठ्यक्रम प्रोग्रामिंग के लिए पूर्ण newbies के अनुकूल हैं।","All of the courses require you to run MacOs, Linux, or if you’re on Windows, WSL2. Though the course name may sound like it’s only aimed towards Ruby developers, it actually means that it assumes no knowledge of types, pointers, concurrency, or other similar things. Non-ruby developers are welcomed!":"यह छोटा अभी तक व्यापक मार्गदर्शिका है जिसका उद्देश्य डेवलपर्स को क्रिस्टल के साथ रूबी के विपरीत क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा को सीखने और समझने में मदद करना है।","You’ll cover the basics of writing your first Crystal program, types, concurrency, metaprogramming, and more. By the end, you’ll have enough knowledge of Crystal to start exploring Crystal’s frameworks and libraries.":"आप अपने पहले क्रिस्टल प्रोग्राम, प्रकार, संगति, मेटाप्रोग्रामिंग, और बहुत कुछ लिखने की मूल बातें कवर करेंगे।","Prior experience with programming is required to take this course.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम को लेने के लिए प्रोग्रामिंग के साथ पूर्व अनुभव की आवश्यकता है।","After understanding the advantages of Crystal over Ruby and installing Crystal on your PC, you’ll get right into writing your first Crystal program. You’ll learn the basics of a Crystal project — implementing FizzBuzz in the language — which will help you grasp Crystal’s syntax and structure, as well as learn how to run Crystal programs.":"रूबी पर क्रिस्टल के फायदों और अपने पीसी पर क्रिस्टल स्थापित करने के बाद, आप अपना पहला क्रिस्टल प्रोग्राम लिखने के लिए सही हो जाएंगे।","Rubyists love testing. You’ll quickly discover that Crystal makes it easy to write and run tests using its built-in framework.":"रूबीस्ट्स को परीक्षण पसंद है।","Rubyists love dynamic typing; Crystal is statically typed. Though most of the time. Crystal doesn’t feel like it’s statically typed anyways because you rarely need to specify the type thanks to intelligent type inference. And because of static types, you’ll find out about method overloading, where you have different methods with the same name and different number of arguments.":"रूबीस को डायनेमिक टाइपिंग पसंद है;","Crystal offers first-class support for concurrent programming through Channels. You’ll learn how to spawn multiple messages at the same time. You’ll also discover how Crystal’s metaprogramming capabilities can rival those of Ruby (even though Ruby is interpreted whereas Crystal is compiled), along with how to interoperate with C libraries using C bindings. Because why write something that has already been written?":"क्रिस्टल चैनलों के माध्यम से समवर्ती प्रोग्रामिंग के लिए प्रथम श्रेणी का समर्थन प्रदान करता है।","This course consists of 10 chapters. You’ll learn by reading through the course chapters and looking at the code examples provided.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम में 10 अध्याय शामिल हैं।","Website":"वेबसाइट","crystalforrubyists.com":"crystalforrubyists.com","Serdar Dogruyol":"सेडर डोगुयोल","None":"कोई नहीं","Serdar Dogruyol is the author of":"Serdar Dogruyol के लेखक हैं","(the blazingly fast web framework you saw in":"(आप जो तेजतर्रार फास्ट वेब फ्रेमवर्क देखे गए थे","), a curator of Crystal Weekly, and a Crystal Core Member. He’s a Crystalian who has extensive experience working with a variety of languages, including Ruby, Java, PHP, Crystal, and Elixir.":"), क्रिस्टल वीकली का एक क्यूरेटर, और एक क्रिस्टल कोर सदस्य।","As this course does not provide any exercises, you should try doing some which are offered in the 6th and 7th ranking of this article.":"जैसा कि यह पाठ्यक्रम कोई अभ्यास प्रदान नहीं करता है, आपको कुछ ऐसा करने की कोशिश करनी चाहिए जो इस लेख की 6 वीं और 7 वीं रैंकिंग में पेश किए जाते हैं।","My second pick for the best Crystal course are":"सबसे अच्छा क्रिस्टल कोर्स के लिए मेरी दूसरी पिक हैं","the open-source tutorials hosted on the official Crystal language website":"आधिकारिक क्रिस्टल भाषा वेबसाइट पर आयोजित ओपन-सोर्स ट्यूटोरियल","Targeted at novice Crystal programmers and people with no experience with programming, you’ll learn the basics of the Crystal language in a very short amount of time.":"नौसिखिया क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामर और प्रोग्रामिंग के साथ कोई अनुभव नहीं करने वाले लोगों पर लक्षित, आप बहुत कम समय में क्रिस्टल भाषा की मूल बातें सीखेंगे।","The content is sufficient but limited. I recommend that you supplement your learning with the 6th and 7th practical courses in this ranking.":"सामग्री पर्याप्त है लेकिन सीमित है।","Prior programming experience is recommended, but not required.":"पूर्व प्रोग्रामिंग अनुभव की सिफारिश की जाती है, लेकिन आवश्यकता नहीं है।","You’ll begin this course with the famous first message every programmer has ingrained into their brains — ”Hello World!”. Although it’s simple, you’ll get to know the structure of a Crystal program this way, that is top-level scope is treated as part of the main program.":"आप इस पाठ्यक्रम को प्रसिद्ध प्रथम संदेश के साथ शुरू करेंगे, प्रत्येक प्रोग्रामर ने अपने दिमाग में प्रवेश किया है - \"हैलो वर्ल्ड!\"।","Next, you’ll learn about variables and data types. One thing to note is that variables can be reassigned to different values and even different data types, which may feel a lot like dynamic types in":"इसके बाद, आप चर और डेटा प्रकारों के बारे में जानेंगे।","Ruby":"माणिक",". Then, you’ll also learn how to do arithmetic and string operations in Crystal, which are very much painless to perform.":"।","Every programming language needs to have control constructs as well as methods. You’ll learn how to use conditionals and loops to have your program make or repeat decisions. Methods, on the other hand, allow you to avoid duplicating the same chunk of code. You’ll learn how to create methods with arguments and type restrictions to ensure correctness of your program.":"प्रत्येक प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा को नियंत्रण निर्माण के साथ -साथ विधियों के लिए भी आवश्यक है।","Finally, you’ll be given two examples of simple programs for you to explore. One of them is a command line application where you’ll learn how to deal with getting user input and producing an output, whereas the other will open your eyes to server processing with HTTP servers.":"अंत में, आपको खोजने के लिए सरल कार्यक्रमों के दो उदाहरण दिए जाएंगे।","This course is made up of multiple tutorials focusing on different aspects of the language. You’ll learn by reading through them as well as by studying the example applications provided.":"यह पाठ्यक्रम भाषा के विभिन्न पहलुओं पर ध्यान केंद्रित करने वाले कई ट्यूटोरियल से बना है।","Crystal Team":"क्रिस्टल टीम","crystal-lang.org":"crystal-lang.org","The Crystal website also contains guides to other aspects of Crystal programming such as concurrency or performance, along with manuals for the compiler and the shards command.":"क्रिस्टल वेबसाइट में क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग के अन्य पहलुओं जैसे समवर्ती या प्रदर्शन के अन्य पहलुओं के गाइड भी शामिल हैं, साथ ही कंपाइलर और शार्क कमांड के लिए मैनुअल के साथ।","Also, the entire website is":"इसके अलावा, पूरी वेबसाइट है","open-sourced including the tutorials and guides":"ट्यूटोरियल और गाइड सहित ओपन-सोर्स",". Anyone can contribute towards helping new Crystallians learn and adopt the language!":"।","My third pick for the best course is a bit peculiar.":"सबसे अच्छे पाठ्यक्रम के लिए मेरी तीसरी पिक थोड़ी अजीब है।","Groxio’s":"ग्रोक्सियो का","Crystal Course":"क्रिस्टल कोर्स","combines a course book, videos (informational and instructional), community resources, and coding projects all in one package.":"एक कोर्स बुक, वीडियो (सूचनात्मक और निर्देशात्मक), सामुदायिक संसाधन और कोडिंग परियोजनाओं को एक पैकेज में जोड़ता है।","By following the":"अनुसरण करके","Dreyfus learning model":"ड्रेफस लर्निंग मॉडल",", Groxio provides the necessary step-by-step instructions for beginners to start Crystal, and perhaps more crucially, exercises and projects that intermediates need to follow up with in order to break from their newbie status.":", ग्रोक्सियो क्रिस्टल शुरू करने के लिए शुरुआती लोगों के लिए आवश्यक चरण-दर-चरण निर्देश प्रदान करता है, और शायद अधिक महत्वपूर्ण रूप से, व्यायाम और परियोजनाएं जो मध्यवर्ती को अपनी नौसिखिया स्थिति से तोड़ने के लिए पालन करने की आवश्यकता है।","If you’re willing to shell out a little bit of cash for a multimodal learning experience, this course wouldn’t disappoint!":"यदि आप एक मल्टीमॉडल सीखने के अनुभव के लिए थोड़ा सा नकदी खोलने के लिए तैयार हैं, तो यह पाठ्यक्रम निराश नहीं करेगा!","You should have some experience with programming prior to taking this course.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम को लेने से पहले आपको प्रोग्रामिंग के साथ कुछ अनुभव होना चाहिए।","You’ll begin with an elucidation of the fundamental principles and philosophy behind Crystal to help you appreciate the language. Afterward, you’ll engross yourself in the basic details of Crystal, such as installation and syntax. By creating a simple “Hello, World!” program, you’ll help crystallize the structure of a typical project into your mindspace, before diving deeper in the details.":"आप भाषा की सराहना करने में मदद करने के लिए क्रिस्टल के पीछे मौलिक सिद्धांतों और दर्शन के साथ शुरू करेंगे।","Next, you’ll explore decision-making with cases and if statements, and learn how to group and manipulate data with arrays, tuples, and hashes. You’ll also discover the power of procs and blocks for creating reusable code.":"इसके बाद, आप मामलों और यदि बयानों के साथ निर्णय लेने का पता लगाएंगे, और सीखें कि कैसे समूह और सरणियों, ट्यूपल्स और हैश के साथ डेटा में हेरफेर करें।","Moving on, you’ll get a test of the object-oriented side of Crystal with classes and modules. You’ll learn how to organize and structure code in larger projects, and grasp key OOP concepts like instantiation, inheritance, and polymorphism. These concepts will help you write complex and scalable software, making it easier to maintain and upgrade in the future.":"आगे बढ़ते हुए, आपको कक्षाओं और मॉड्यूल के साथ क्रिस्टल के ऑब्जेक्ट-ओरिएंटेड पक्ष का परीक्षण मिलेगा।","Crystal is a statically typed language. You’ll learn and master types by first understanding their importance — to ensure code correctness at compile time. You’ll also learn how to create and wield your own custom types to protect your code from potential errors too. Finally, you’ll bring everything together by planning, building, and deploying Crystal projects, including managing dependencies and concurrency, through actual hands-on projects.":"क्रिस्टल एक सांख्यिकीय रूप से टाइप की गई भाषा है।","This course consists of a course book, video tutorials, community resources, and projects. You’ll learn by reading through the book chapters, watching videos about the Crystal language as well as videos by the instructor where they code hands-on, checking out the handy community resources, and most importantly, working on the larger coding projects.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम में एक पाठ्यक्रम पुस्तक, वीडियो ट्यूटोरियल, सामुदायिक संसाधन और परियोजनाएं शामिल हैं।","Groxio":"ग्रोक्सियो","Author":"लेखक","Bruce A. Tate":"ब्रूस ए। टेट","Bruce A. Tate is a programmer and CEO of Groxio where he is helping to redefine how computer languages are taught and learned. He’s the author of Seven Languages in Seven Weeks and Programming Phoenix, among other titles, and has been involved with Elixir from the very beginning.":"ब्रूस ए। टेट ग्रोक्सियो के एक प्रोग्रामर और सीईओ हैं, जहां वह यह फिर से परिभाषित करने में मदद कर रहे हैं कि कंप्यूटर भाषाओं को कैसे सिखाया जाता है और सीखा जाता है।","Gábor Szabó has":"Gábor Szabó है","an excellent introductory course to Crystal programming":"क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग के लिए एक उत्कृष्ट परिचयात्मक पाठ्यक्रम","I like this":"मुझे यह पसंद हे","course particularly because it’s easy to let the video play, sitback, and learn. This is because Gábor Szabó is an excellent teacher who can explain in detail what is happening on screen with his":"विशेष रूप से पाठ्यक्रम क्योंकि वीडियो को खेलना, बैठना और सीखना आसान है।","well-crafted slides and examples":"अच्छी तरह से तैयार की गई स्लाइड और उदाहरण",". Though of course, it’d be a much more effective learning experience if you were to follow along writing down code examples at home.":"।","The video series covers most but not all of the slides in the link, so by the end of the course, you’ll have learned the basics of the Crystal language, including its syntax, type system, and how to run code. You should check out the slides, as they also give you exercises to try and complete.":"वीडियो श्रृंखला में सबसे अधिक शामिल है, लेकिन लिंक में सभी स्लाइड नहीं हैं, इसलिए पाठ्यक्रम के अंत तक, आपने क्रिस्टल भाषा की मूल बातें सीख ली हैं, जिसमें इसके सिंटैक्स, टाइप सिस्टम और कैसे कोड चलाना है।","If you have an hour to spare to see what Crystal is all about, and also have some prior programming experience, this is a great course for you.":"यदि आपके पास यह देखने के लिए एक घंटा है कि क्रिस्टल क्या है, और कुछ पूर्व प्रोग्रामिंग अनुभव भी है, तो यह आपके लिए एक महान पाठ्यक्रम है।","In this course, you’ll learn the basics of the Crystal language. After some brief set up (running Crystal in a Docker container and exploring third party libraries called ‘shards’), you’ll begin learning how variables and data types work in Crystal. Indeed, you’ll be amazed by Crystal’s static but versatile types, from primitive to compound types, and concatenating strings to doing mathematical operations on numbers. You’ll be able to write a command line program that takes arguments passed into the standard input (STDIN) and prints a result to the screen.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम में, आप क्रिस्टल भाषा की मूल बातें सीखेंगे।","You’ll also learn about early exit in Crystal, create basic shapes like rectangles, discover the concept of interactive environments, and also how to write Crystal one-liners. Last but not least, you’ll learn how to generate random numbers in Crystal.":"आप क्रिस्टल में शुरुआती निकास के बारे में भी सीखेंगे, आयतों जैसे बुनियादी आकार बनाएंगे, इंटरैक्टिव वातावरण की अवधारणा की खोज करेंगे, और यह भी कि क्रिस्टल वन-लाइनर्स कैसे लिखें।","This course is 3–4 hours long. You’ll learn by watching the videos in the series and following along with the instructor. Additionally, you can complete the exercises given to strengthen your understanding of the Crystal programming concepts.":"यह कोर्स 3-4 घंटे लंबा है।","Chanell":"चैनल","Code Maven":"कोड मावेन","Gábor Szabó":"गोरबोर सज़ाबो","Views":"दृश्य","1.2K":"1.2k","Likes":"को यह पसंद है","Gábor Szabó is a programmer with almost 40 years of experience in programming languages such as Perl and Python. He runs the Code Maven YouTube channel and":"Gábor Szabó एक प्रोग्रामर है जिसमें लगभग 40 वर्षों का अनुभव होता है, जैसे कि प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाओं जैसे कि पर्ल और पायथन।","website":"वेबसाइट","He also has other courses written for beginners such as a":"उनके पास अन्य पाठ्यक्रम भी हैं जैसे शुरुआती के लिए एक जैसे","Perl tutorial":"पर्ल ट्यूटोरियल","as well as a":"अच्छी तरह से आसा के रूप में","Perl, Python, and Go courses bundle":"पर्ल, पायथन, और गो कोर्स बंडल","Learn Crystal Programming":"क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग जानें","is another great project-based introductory course to the Crystal programming language. Unlike the third course in this ranking however, this":"क्रिस्टल प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा के लिए एक और महान परियोजना-आधारित परिचयात्मक पाठ्यक्रम है।","course by Timnan Sheni is friendly towards absolute beginners.":"टिमन शेनी द्वारा पाठ्यक्रम निरपेक्ष शुरुआती लोगों के अनुकूल है।","You’ll learn how to write powerful, efficient, and concise programs in Crystal through four hands-on projects: a name guessing game; a rock, paper, scissors game; a simple calculator application; and lastly, an automatic file organizer.":"आप सीखेंगे कि चार हाथों पर परियोजनाओं के माध्यम से क्रिस्टल में शक्तिशाली, कुशल और संक्षिप्त कार्यक्रम कैसे लिखना है: एक नाम अनुमान लगाने का खेल;","No prior programming experience is required to take this course!":"इस पाठ्यक्रम को लेने के लिए कोई पूर्व प्रोग्रामिंग अनुभव आवश्यक नहीं है!","You’ll start off this course by installing Crystal as well as its relevant extensions on VSCode to get the tooling out of the way.":"आप टूलिंग को रास्ते से हटाने के लिए VSCode पर क्रिस्टल के साथ -साथ VSCode पर इसके प्रासंगिक एक्सटेंशन को स्थापित करके इस पाठ्यक्रम को शुरू करेंगे।","Next, you’ll explore Crystal’s data types, which are very much similar to Ruby’s with types such as Strings, Numbers, Floats, and data structures like Arrays and Hashes. You’ll focus on handling user input and then making decisions based on that by using control flow.":"इसके बाद, आप क्रिस्टल के डेटा प्रकारों का पता लगाएंगे, जो रूबी के समान हैं जैसे कि स्ट्रिंग्स, नंबर, फ्लोट्स और डेटा संरचनाओं जैसे कि सरणियों और हैश जैसे प्रकार के साथ।","“What is control flow?”, I hear you ask. Control flow consists of conditional statements such as if statements and loops such as while and unless loops that help the program choose between code paths or repeat blocks of code respectively. Armed with these concepts, you’ll create a name guessing game (similar to hangman) and use nested logic to play rock, paper, scissors.":"\"नियंत्रण प्रवाह क्या है?\", मैंने सुना है कि आप पूछते हैं।","The kind of programming you’ve just done is called imperative programming, where instructions are written step-by-step to perform a task. But there’s a more powerful programming paradigm called object-oriented programming, where instead of giving step-by-step instructions, you create “objects” that represent things or ideas in your program. Each object has its own properties (like name or color), can perform actions (like move or change color), and can even interact with each other. You’ll make great use of these concepts when you develop a calculator app, before finally ending the course with a IO-intensive app that organizes files into folders based on their file format.":"जिस तरह की प्रोग्रामिंग आपने अभी-अभी किया है, उसे इम्पीरेटिव प्रोग्रामिंग कहा जाता है, जहां निर्देश एक कार्य करने के लिए चरण-दर-चरण लिखे जाते हैं।","This course is 3 hours long. You’ll learn by watching the lecture videos and gaining hands-on experience by building various projects.":"यह कोर्स 3 घंटे लंबा है।","Timnan Sheni":"टिम्नान शेनी","Timnan Sheni is a software developer and tutor specializing in Ruby on Rails. He runs":"टिमन शेनी एक सॉफ्टवेयर डेवलपर और ट्यूटर है जो रूबी पर रेल में विशेषज्ञता रखता है।","a YouTube channel":"एक YouTube चैनल","as well as a blog where he posts educational content on Ruby on Rails and Javascript.":"साथ ही एक ब्लॉग जहां वह रेल और जावास्क्रिप्ट पर रूबी पर शैक्षिक सामग्री पोस्ट करता है।","Exercism is an open-source, online platform":"व्यायाम एक ओपन-सोर्स, ऑनलाइन प्लेटफ़ॉर्म है","for learning and practicing programming. They provide a collection of":"प्रोग्रामिंग सीखने और अभ्यास करने के लिए।","coding exercises in difficulties, from easy to hard, in various programming languages (including Crystal!).":"विभिन्न प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाओं में (क्रिस्टल सहित!) में, कठिन से कठिन से हार्ड से हार्ड से कोडिंग अभ्यास।","When I want to learn a programming language, I use Exercism to complement my learning experience. Not only does it allow me to practice what I’ve learned, but it also gives me the opportunity to compare my solutions with others. And that’s not all — the best part about Exercism is that it offers":"जब मैं एक प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा सीखना चाहता हूं, तो मैं अपने सीखने के अनुभव के पूरक के लिए व्यायाम का उपयोग करता हूं।","mentoring.":"सलाह।","I can submit my lousy code for any exercise, and after some time, receive constructive feedback from an experienced developer. This helps me improve my coding skills and write less lousier code. And so can you!":"मैं किसी भी अभ्यास के लिए अपना घटिया कोड जमा कर सकता हूं, और कुछ समय बाद, एक अनुभवी डेवलपर से रचनात्मक प्रतिक्रिया प्राप्त कर सकता हूं।","Exercism offers Crystal exercises of varying difficulty levels, of which there are easy and medium exercises.":"व्यायाम अलग -अलग कठिनाई स्तरों के क्रिस्टल अभ्यास प्रदान करता है, जिनमें से आसान और मध्यम व्यायाम हैं।","Examples of easy exercises include reporting leap years, converting binary numbers to their denary equivalent, and encrypting/decrypting ciphers such as Atbash, Caesar, or rational.":"आसान अभ्यासों के उदाहरणों में लीप वर्षों की रिपोर्टिंग, बाइनरी नंबरों को उनके समतुल्य समतुल्य में परिवर्तित करना, और एटबैश, सीज़र, या तर्कसंगत जैसे सिफर को एन्क्रिप्टिंग/डिक्रिप्टिंग/डिक्रिप्टिंग करना शामिल है।","Some medium difficulty tasks are as follows: determining if a number is mathematically perfect, abundant, or deficient, calculating a person’s allergy score, and generating proverbs from a list of words.":"कुछ मध्यम कठिनाई कार्य निम्नानुसार हैं: यह निर्धारित करना कि क्या कोई संख्या गणितीय रूप से परिपूर्ण, प्रचुर मात्रा में है, या कमी है, किसी व्यक्ति के एलर्जी स्कोर की गणना करना, और शब्दों की सूची से नीतिवचन उत्पन्न करना।","This course is self-paced, so you can take all the time you need to complete the 55+ hands-on programming exercises. Each exercise comes with automatic feedback of your code as well as personal mentoring to help you understand your code’s strengths and flaws.":"यह पाठ्यक्रम स्व-पुस्तक है, इसलिए आप 55 हैंड्स-ऑन प्रोग्रामिंग अभ्यास को पूरा करने के लिए हर समय ले सकते हैं।","Exercism":"व्यायाम","All levels":"सभी स्तर","1.5K":"1.5k","Exercism provides exercises on 50+ programming languages like Python, Kotlin, F, and even WebAssembly.":"व्यायाम पायथन, कोटलिन, एफ, और यहां तक कि वेबसैबली जैसी 50 प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाओं पर अभ्यास प्रदान करता है।","Their mission is to help everyone get really good at programming, regardless of their background, share the love of programming, and help people upskill as part of their upward social mobility.":"उनका मिशन सभी को प्रोग्रामिंग में वास्तव में अच्छा होने में मदद करना है, चाहे उनकी पृष्ठभूमि की परवाह किए बिना, प्रोग्रामिंग के प्यार को साझा करें, और लोगों को उनकी ऊपर की सामाजिक गतिशीलता के हिस्से के रूप में अपस्किल करने में मदद करें।","Around 40 people have contributed towards the Crystal syllabus and exercises, with over 60 mentors available at the time of writing.":"लगभग 40 लोगों ने क्रिस्टल पाठ्यक्रम और अभ्यासों में योगदान दिया है, लेखन के समय 60 से अधिक आकाओं के साथ उपलब्ध है।","The Crystal Language Koans":"क्रिस्टल लैंग्वेज कोन्स","are a set of":"का एक सेट है","exercises aimed at teaching you the basics (and more!) of Crystal. It’s an interactive learning tool that’ll guide you through a series of challenges through trial-and-error unit testing, incrementally building your Crystal programming skills.":"क्रिस्टल की मूल बातें (और अधिक!) सिखाने के उद्देश्य से व्यायाम।","This course is much more structured than the previous course, dealing with a much wider variety of Crystal topics, including syntax, data structures, control structures, object-oriented programming, web programming, and more. The goal is to provide an engaging and hands-on way of learning the language while also reinforcing key concepts.":"यह पाठ्यक्रम पिछले पाठ्यक्रम की तुलना में बहुत अधिक संरचित है, जिसमें सिंटैक्स, डेटा संरचनाओं, नियंत्रण संरचनाओं, ऑब्जेक्ट-ओरिएंटेड प्रोग्रामिंग, वेब प्रोग्रामिंग, और बहुत कुछ सहित क्रिस्टल विषयों की एक व्यापक विविधता के साथ काम करना है।","You should have some prior experience with Crystal in order to take this course.":"इस पाठ्यक्रम को लेने के लिए आपको क्रिस्टल के साथ कुछ पूर्व अनुभव होना चाहिए।","The sub-bullets (in italic) in the list show what exercises are part of that topic.":"सूची में उप-बुललेट्स (इटैलिक में) दिखाते हैं कि उस विषय का हिस्सा कौन से अभ्यास हैं।","Data types and data structures: The building blocks of every program, you’ll need them for correctness and efficiency.":"डेटा प्रकार और डेटा संरचनाएं: हर प्रोग्राम के बिल्डिंग ब्लॉक, आपको शुद्धता और दक्षता के लिए उनकी आवश्यकता होगी।","booleans, numbers, strings, symbols, nil, enums, arrays, tuples, named_tuples, sets, hashes, ranges.":"बूलियन, नंबर, स्ट्रिंग्स, प्रतीक, निल, एनम्स, एरेज़, ट्यूपल्स, नामांकित_टूज़, सेट, हैश, रेंज।","Control structure and functions: These allow the program to make and repeat decisions, promoting code reuse.":"नियंत्रण संरचना और कार्य: ये कार्यक्रम को निर्णय लेने और दोहराने की अनुमति देते हैं, कोड पुन: उपयोग को बढ़ावा देते हैं।","loops, blocks, functions, splat.":"लूप, ब्लॉक, फ़ंक्शंस, स्प्लैट।","Object-Oriented Programming: Learn how to organize software around object, which have data and behavior.":"ऑब्जेक्ट-ओरिएंटेड प्रोग्रामिंग: ऑब्जेक्ट के आसपास सॉफ़्टवेयर को व्यवस्थित करना सीखें, जिसमें डेटा और व्यवहार है।","structs, classes, chaining_methods":"संरचनाएं, कक्षाएं, chaining_methods","Type System: Explore Crystal’s robust type system in detail.":"टाइप सिस्टम: क्रिस्टल के मजबूत प्रकार की प्रणाली को विस्तार से देखें।","generics, type_reflection":"जेनरिक, टाइप_फ्लेक्शन","Error Handling: Errors are bound to happen in run-time. Unlike Ruby though, they expand at compile time.":"मैक्रोज़: रूबी की तरह, क्रिस्टल में मैक्रोज़ हैं।","macros, macro_hooks":"मैक्रोज़, मैक्रो_हूक","Interoperability: Crystal prides itself on C interoperability.":"इंटरऑपरेबिलिटी: क्रिस्टल सी इंटरऑपरेबिलिटी पर खुद को गर्व करता है।","c_interop, low_level_primitives":"c_interop, low_level_primitives","Specialized Data Types: Sometimes regular data types don’t cut it. In this guide, I will first list Flexbox courses and tutorials since a lot of concepts such as justify-content and align-items also exist in Grid.":"फ्लेक्सबॉक्स और ग्रिड को समझने के लिए आपको बहुत सारे ट्यूटोरियल हैं।","Once you are more familiar with Flex, Grid gets easier to understand. Then, after getting through Grid, I will also be listing a few courses here to get you acquainted with using them both together and hope that it will help you make better responsive websites.":"एक बार जब आप फ्लेक्स से अधिक परिचित हो जाते हैं, तो ग्रिड को समझना आसान हो जाता है।","Flexbox and Grid can do most of the heavy lifting when you are working on a project but sometimes, you would like certain elements to stick to the top (like a navbar) when you are scrolling the page or you would like to place an element at a specific place. This cannot be effectively accomplished with Flexbox and Grid, and that’s when Positioning comes into play. Therefore, I will be adding some tutorials on positioning elements as well.":"जब आप किसी प्रोजेक्ट पर काम कर रहे होते हैं, तो फ्लेक्सबॉक्स और ग्रिड अधिकांश भारी उठाने के लिए कर सकते हैं, लेकिन कभी -कभी, आप कुछ तत्वों को शीर्ष पर (जैसे नवबार की तरह) से चिपके रहते हैं, जब आप पेज को स्क्रॉल कर रहे होते हैं या आप एक तत्व रखना चाहते हैं","I have personally been using Grid more often than Flexbox, since a Grid can provide the same functionality as Flexbox but it also provides more control over the contents.":"मैं व्यक्तिगत रूप से फ्लेक्सबॉक्स की तुलना में अधिक बार ग्रिड का उपयोग कर रहा हूं, क्योंकि एक ग्रिड फ्लेक्सबॉक्स के समान कार्यक्षमता प्रदान कर सकता है लेकिन यह सामग्री पर अधिक नियंत्रण भी प्रदान करता है।","Flexbox.io (Wes Bos)":"Flexbox.io (WES BOS)","2 hours":"2 घंटे","Best course
